timeline.message:
Add release notes for 0.236

update release notes

timeline.author: tdcmeehan
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+=============
+Release 0.236
+=============
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fixed translation of searched case expressions to be flat.

replies.bodyText: Reading the description it seems like we are trying to convert searched case expressions from being translated as nester if statements to switch case.
replies.author: varungajjala

replies.bodyText:
I would say
Fix query failure due for searched case expression with large number of cases.
replies.author: caithagoras

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            * Adds PreparedStatement support for getMetaData.
          
          
            
            * Add support for ``PreparedStatement#getMetaData``.
timeline.author: tdcmeehan
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+=============
+Release 0.236
+=============
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fixed translation of searched case expressions to be flat.
+* Improve experience by warning user of poorly performant UNION DISTINCT usage.
+
+Verifier Changes
+________________
+* Add ``ErrorType`` of query failures to verification outputs.
+* Add support to auto-resolve result mismatch for structured-type columns.
+* Add support to auto-resolve result mismatch in case the query uses functions to be ignored.
+
+Hive Changes
+____________
+* Fix  ANALYZE table_name failure for tables with map, list or struct columns (:issue:`14494`).
+* Fix Parquet schema mismatch when type is upgraded (int32 -> int64).
+* Improve planning time for queries that scan large number of partitions across multiple partition columns.
+* Add local data caching support with `Alluxio <https://www.alluxio.io/>`_ cache library. To enable it, set config `cache.enabled=true` and `cache.type=ALLUXIO`.
+* Allow Hive file caching to cache Parquet metadata reads
+
+JDBC Changes
+____________
+* Adds PreparedStatement support for getMetaData.

replies.bodyText: Any reason why this was resolved and the changes were not made ? We should properly format class and method names.
replies.author: mayankgarg1990

timeline.bodyText: Fix `ANALYZE` query failure for tables with structure-typed columns. (:issue:`14494).

timeline.bodyText:
Avoid abbreviations. Use double back quotes instead of single back quotes.
To enable it, set configuration property ``cache.enabled=true`` and ``cache.type=ALLUXIO``.

replies.bodyText:
@mayankgarg1990 "searched case expression with large number of cases" is basically:
CASE
  WHEN ... THEN ...
  WHEN ... THEN ...
  ...
END

with lots of WHEN clauses.
replies.author: caithagoras

replies.bodyText:
the confusing part of this for me is "searched case expression".  Seems it just means "case expression", so I would get rid of the word "searched"
Fix query failure for case expression with large number of cases.
replies.author: rschlussel

timeline.bodyText:
Going with the language in https://github.com/prestodb/presto/wiki/Release-Notes-Guidelines#phrasing - lets rephrase the second sentence as:
This can be enabled by setting the configuration property ``cache.enabled`` to ``true`` and ``cache.type`` to `ALLUXIO``

timeline.bodyText:
does structured-type mean row types?
Also, nit  say:
Add support for auto-resolving result mismatches...
timeline.author: rschlussel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+=============
+Release 0.236
+=============
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix query failure due to searched case expression with large number of cases.
+* Add warning about inefficient use of ``UNION DISTINCT``.
+
+JDBC Changes
+____________
+* Add PreparedStatement support for getMetaData.
+
+Hive Changes
+____________
+* Fix ``ANALYZE`` query failure for tables with structure-typed columns. (:issue:`14494`).
+* Fix Parquet schema mismatch when type is upgraded from ``int32`` to ``int64``.
+* Improve planning time for queries that scan large number of partitions across multiple partition columns.
+* Add local data caching support with `Alluxio <https://www.alluxio.io/>`_ cache library. This can be enabled by setting the configuration property ``cache.enabled`` to ``true`` and ``cache.type`` to `ALLUXIO``.
+* Improve Hive file caching by introducing Parquet metadata caching.
+
+Verifier Changes
+________________
+* Add ``ErrorType`` of query failures to verification outputs.
+* Add support to auto-resolve result mismatch for structured-type columns.

replies.bodyText: structured-type means array types, map types, and row types
replies.author: caithagoras

replies.bodyText:
* Add support for auto-resolving result mismatches for array, map, and row columns.
* Add support for auto-resolving result mismatches for queries that use certain
  functions. The list of functions can be configured by setting the configuration
  property ``ignored-functions.functions``.
replies.author: caithagoras

+* Improve planning time for queries that scan large number of partitions across multiple partition columns.
+* Add local data caching support with `Alluxio <https://www.alluxio.io/>`_ cache library. This can be enabled by setting the configuration property ``cache.enabled`` to ``true`` and ``cache.type`` to `ALLUXIO`.
